comments.body: I don't know the standard for `conda` packages but would it be better to link to the documentation (http://loky.readthedocs.io) for the home page?

We use whatever is specified as the [`url` on PyPI]( https://github.com/tomMoral/loky/blob/2.1.4/setup.py#L60 ) for `home`. That said, have added the `doc_url` and `dev_url` fields. The former now points to the RTD page.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +29,33 @@
about:
  home: https://github.com/tomMoral/loky
  license: BSD 3-Clause
  license_file: LICENSE.txt
